metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48425 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel through 6.2.7, fs/ntfs3/inode.c has an invalid kfree because it does not validate MFT flags before replaying logs.

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
